Technique: VARNISHED; PAINTED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; BURNED
Name: Mummiform shabti for Khons-em-renpe
Description: This well proportioned mummiform shabti has a striking face with large ears protruding from under a striated wig. The collar is rendered in relief. The whole figure was given a light blue-green background, with details added in black paint. The work was finished off with a layer of varnish. The lower half of this shabti is now missing.
